actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to provide emergency relief, rehabilitation, and humanitarian assistance to the people who have been victimized by the recent earthquakes in Turkey.

summary.text: Turkey Relief and Rehabilitation Act - Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize the President to grant assistance to the victims of earthquakes in Turkey. Authorizes the appropriation of $10,000,000 for fiscal year 1977 for such assistance. Requires that such assistance, to the maximum extent possible: (1) be distributed by United States voluntary relief agencies and other international relief and development organizations; and (2) be used for construction of seismic-resistant housing.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to provide emergency relief, rehabilitation, and humanitarian assistance to the people who have been victimized by the recent earthquakes in Turkey.
